passages.name: She passes from sight
passages.text:
You descend the stairs and enter the courtyard. Her <<cyclinglink $feet "cloven hooves" "arachnid claws" "writhing coils">> left smears of ichor like the stain of rotten fruit.

[[Return to your room]]

[[Get on your knees and lick her stain]]

links.text: Get on your knees and lick her stain

destination.name: Get on your knees and lick her stain

passages.name: break the loop
passages.text: Ideate: <<cyclinglink $ideate "Letting go" "Falling into the sky" "Into the jungle" "Into the sea" "Riding into the storm" "Shredded by gravel" "Crashing" "Breaking apart" "Screaming">>.\n\n[[Break the loop]]

passages.name: blessing_weapon
passages.text:
with an invocation

<<cyclinglink $weapon_invocation "May everyone who touches me perish" "Sharing blood with moonlight" "Everything that power permits">>

[[Yes|weapon_result]]

passages.name: Ropes
passages.text: Laundry, drying meat, lanterns, festival ribbons.\n\n[[Look away|City]]

passages.name: worms
passages.text: They pick her bones clean.\n\n[[How thoughtful|bath]]

passages.name: month
passages.text:
Which month were you born in?

[[One|element][$month = 1]], the Broken Coffin
[[Two|element][$month = 2]], the Flower Eater
[[Three|element][$month = 3]], the Ocean Cloud
[[Four|element][$month = 4]], the Fruit Heart
[[Five|element][$month = 5]], the Angel's Egg
[[Six|element][$month = 6]], the Dire Maiden
[[Seven|element][$month = 7]], the Orphan
[[Eight|element][$month = 8]], the Snake's Milk
[[Nine|element][$month = 9]], the Locust Kill
[[Ten|element][$month = 10]], the Moth Vendetta
[[Eleven|element][$month = 11]], the Eye in the Ground
[[Twelve|element][$month = 12]], the Salt Key

passages.name: the thing
passages.text:
You take the thing into the torch-lit depths where the agents stand guard.

<<replace "There would be screams, if the thing did not eat screams.">>There would be screams, if the thing did not eat screams.

<<replace "There would be blood, if the thing did not eat blood.">>There would be blood, if the thing did not eat blood.

<<replace "There would be death, if the thing did not eat death.">>There would be death, if the thing did not eat death.

[[Walk past with eyes straight ahead]]<<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

links.text: Walk past with eyes straight ahead

destination.name: Walk past with eyes straight ahead

passages.name: Black petals
passages.text:
Offerings for the dire maidens. Depending on how much memory one has watered the flower with, an offering may be a sacrifice.

And in the manner of sacrifices, each petal looks the same, whether it contains a moment or a lifetime.

[[Okay|City]]

passages.name: thislife
passages.text:
Before living this life, have a pen or sharpie nearby, something that can write on skin.

Purple links change. Pink links move forward. The colorblind version is [[here|http://slimedaughter.com/games/twine/wtwla/monochrome]].

There is music, so headphones are good. But it's okay if you can't.

Content warning for violence, self-harm, abuse.

[[Okay|interstice]]

passages.name: sleep
passages.text:
<<display "sleep_process">>
<<if $day is 4>>
<<set $ceremony = true>><<timedgoto "Your chambers" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 6>>
<<timedgoto "letter" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 9>>
<<timedgoto "hunting" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 15>>
<<timedgoto "sweetness" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 19>>
<<timedgoto "princess spores" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 22>>
<<timedgoto "flashback_1" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 24>>
<<timedgoto "endless" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 27>>
<<timedgoto "Court" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 28>>
<<timedgoto "shame" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 29>>
<<timedgoto "bath" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 30>>
<<timedgoto "pretense" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 31>>
<<timedgoto "bench" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 32>>
<<timedgoto "drugs" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 33>>
<<timedgoto "her bedroom" 1.5s>>
<<elseif $day is 34>>
<<timedgoto "wake up" 1.5s>>
<<else>>
<<timedgoto "Your chambers" 1.5s>>
<<endif>>

passages.name: webfont
hate
passages.text: Before everything got so bitter and trapped. When it was a clean pure hate moving you forward. Out of the city. Away from the people who hurt <<cyclinglink $hurt "you" "her">>.\n\nShe's [[saying|different]] something.

passages.name: spells
passages.text: Superstition of the skull empire, ignorant of where a witch's true power lies.\n\n[[They will learn|Walk past with eyes straight ahead]]

destination.name: Walk past with eyes straight ahead

passages.name: Breathe
passages.text:
Your friend the witch is in the common room, lingering over a glass of salt sugar citrus fluid, finger stuck in the crease of a book, watching rain run down the windowpane.

Everyone else is asleep. These long rainy days are for resting.

[[Breathe|staircase]]

passages.name: I need different breaths
passages.text:
[[I need a shorter breath|exhale][$breath = "short"]]

[[I need a medium breath|exhale][$breath = "medium"]]

[[I need a longer breath|exhale][$breath = "long"]]

passages.name: now
passages.text:
"Please--"

"<<replace "I just wanted to spend time with you.">>I just wanted to spend time with you."

"Sedina--"

"<<replace "Stay in your room and don't interfere.">>Stay in your room and don't interfere."

"..."

"Goodbye, <<$name>>."

She [[closes|note writer]] the door.<<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: mazelike
passages.text:
This alley leads to a dead end. The stone is stained with smog and acid rain.

<<if $hormone_day is 4>>A [[slime kid]] is here.

[[Return|City]]<<else>>A puddle of green slime is here.

[[Return|City]]<<endif>>

passages.name: burning
passages.text: She grabs at the buried tubes, claws at the seals, tears the caps [[free]].

passages.name: hunting
passages.text:
<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "creep.mp3">><<replace "The empress is hunting humans today">>The empress is hunting humans today.

Her flier hums through the [[sky]], moth wings slicing sunlight.<<endreplace>>

passages.name: another vial
passages.text:
You take out another vial of melter.

<<cyclinglink $body_x "Pain" "Pain..." "Pain.">>

[[Yes|pain]]

passages.name: pretense
passages.text: You are walking down the hall when you see her. She stops and stares, and here, alone in the cool, shadowed corner of the palace, there is no longer any pretense that you do not know each other.\n\n[[And she speaks|last]]<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "friend.mp3">>

passages.name: post_face
passages.text: [[She glides past|impulse]]

passages.name: sky
passages.text:
At the rear of the procession you listen to the always weapons and the sometimes screams.

Arcs of light shoot through the canopy. The smell of burnt <<cyclinglink $burnt "leaves" "vines" "sap" "flesh">>.

A <<replace "custom.">>custom that persists because people are scared that if they question the custom they will fall victim to the intense cruelty of the custom, which persists because they [[fail]] to question it.<<endreplace>>

passages.name: Balconies
passages.text:
Death jungle chokes the land to the north. To the south, ashen wasteland.<<if $dead_person is "balcony">> A dead person is sitting on the balcony, swinging their legs.<<endif>>

<<if $telescope_make gte 4>>You lean on the railing. Your [[telescope]] is mounted nearby.<<else>>You lean on the railing.<<endif>>

[[Leave|Palace]]<<display "wanderfade">>

passages.name: day
passages.text: <<replace "Every">> <<set $damage += 1>><<if $damage gte 4>><<timedgoto "interval" 2.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>> <<replace "day">> <<set $damage += 1>><<if $damage gte 4>><<timedgoto "interval" 2.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>> <<replace "is">> <<set $damage += 1>><<if $damage gte 4>><<timedgoto "interval" 2.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>> <<replace "damage">> <<set $damage += 1>><<if $damage gte 4>><<timedgoto "interval" 2.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>><<set $destination = "Your chambers">>

passages.name: destroyed
passages.text: The holding cells are [[down those stairs|the thing]], in the smell of copper and rat.

passages.name: Visitors
passages.text:
A [[priestess]] from the temple of the 17 goddesses, her raiments sewn with bright jagged minerals that pulsate at the slightest change in light.

An ambassador from the west, in her cloak of spider feathers and her ceremonial [[gas mask]].

And your [[friend]]. Witch green rags, vials of [[ectoplasm]] hanging at her side.

[[Her above all things|her]]

passages.name: tears
passages.text:
An agent runs over and slashes them apart, high screams blowing through the rents in their shrinking skin.

The agent laughs at you and walk away.

[[You smell fire|bonfire]]

passages.name: going
passages.text:
As you slide off the bed your hip catches the nightstand, knocking her purse to the floor.

She gets on her knees and quickly begins putting things back inside.

[[Help her|spill]]

passages.name: Stomp it
passages.text: You stomp it under your boots. Smeared like crushing petals.\n\n[[The mob is going inside the palace]]

links.text: The mob is going inside the palace

destination.name: The mob is going inside the palace

passages.name: gas mask
passages.text: Black with gold trim, a slender hose hanging with a gold filter, obsidian eyes.\n\n[[Wasteland chic|Visitors]]

passages.name: wake up
passages.text: You wake up hours early with nausea eating its way out of your stomach.\n\n[[Get dressed and go to the throne room]]<<stopallsound>>

links.text: Get dressed and go to the throne room

destination.name: Get dressed and go to the throne room

passages.name: StoryTitle
passages.text: With Those We Love Alive

passages.name: jars
passages.text: Ancient hands suspended in green fluid, covered in sigils, vertical columns of ink. \n\n[[Some bizarre old practice|temple]]

passages.name: glyphs
passages.text:
You engraved three glyphs:

<<cyclinglink $glyph_1 "indomitable" "angel-breeder" "beloved tyranny">>
<<cyclinglink $glyph_2 "power over death" "bat-mother" "life-ruiner">>
<<cyclinglink $glyph_3 "rich with souls" "burning waterfalls" "loyal to eternity">>

[[Yes|wrapped]]

passages.name: And now you are going somewhere
passages.text: <<timedgoto "red lake" 1.5s>>

passages.name: Workers
passages.text: "<<print either("We distill the dreams for 5 or 6 years. We find this is the optimal time. After 6, the dreams are too bitter to consume.","These people are criminals. We are reclaiming their wasted potential.","Watch out for spills. We had a nightmare flare up. Busted some pipes.","Next year we should have some nightmare filters in place, that'll prolong the lifespan of the pipes quite a bit.")>>"\n\n[[Nod|dream distillery]]

passages.name: hope
passages.text: "Hope is a shameful thing." Her lips twist into a smile.\n\nYou remember how good it felt to [[hate]] the world together.

passages.name: Wait
passages.text:
She greets her new court by placing thoughts in their minds.

Her aide says, "Go to your chambers. You will know when we have need of you."

She returns to cleaning the skull of the Empress, running her tongue along the effluvial curves.

[[Leave|interval]]<<set $destination = "Palace">>

passages.name: Something that doesn't exist
passages.text:
A non-existent knife is lying on the floor. Your skin tingles.

"When is that knife going to exist?"

"[[Tomorrow|now]]."<<stopallsound>>

passages.name: censer
passages.text: That childhood smell of spices, so mystical, now reminds you of any kitchen.\n\n[[Exhale|temple]]

passages.name: hand_flourish_result
passages.text:
<<if $hand_flourish is "set with a giant ruby">>
They say the ruby is the left eye of a stone queen from the frozen isles, ten feet tall. They say she walks very slowly across the floor of the sea, striding like a red lantern in the abyssal water, and that one day she will find the one who took her eye.<<endif>><<if $hand_flourish is "veined with bright copper strands of hair">>The hair is obviously from the scalp of a heretic. Duh.<<endif>><<if $hand_flourish is "fitted with obsidian nails">>Long sharp nails reflecting like hard ink. Cut from the foot of a volcano at the heart of the ash waste, where even the sky-hungry obelisks are drowned to tips like a bench to sit on.<<endif>>

[[Perfect|hand_finished]]

passages.name: breathing
passages.text:
She approaches the empress with her hands open and <<replace "empty.">>empty.

The knife suddenly exists.

[[One second]]<<endreplace>>

passages.name: gods
passages.text: The gods derive power from silence.\n\n[[...|temple]]

passages.name: I am holding my breath
passages.text: <<if $breath is "medium">><<timedgoto "exhale" 8s>><<endif>><<if $breath is "long">><<timedgoto "exhale" 12s>><<endif>><<if $breath is "short">><<timedgoto "exhale" 4s>><<endif>>

passages.name: css dream
slime kid
passages.text: <<print either("She gurgles, spraying slime on your boots","She's digesting a piece of trash","She climbs around on the wall for awhile, sticking to it like gum","She shows you a drawing she made. It's very good","You teach her some melter tricks","She shows you how to puff up to scare your enemies. Your body doesn't stretch as much, but you promise to study hard","She ripples happily","She's helping a bug find a home","She pretends to be a puddle","She kisses a bug","She hugs a snail","She turns into funny shapes then falls over","She pops like a bubble, spattering slime everywhere, then oozes back together, giggling","She's drawing on the wall with a piece of chalk she found. The whole wall is covered with rain-faded smears of soft pastel")>>.\n\n[[Yay|mazelike]]

passages.name: weapon_result
passages.text:
A <<$weapon_type>> made of <<$weapon_material_1>> and <<$weapon_material_2>>, with the invocation, //<<$weapon_invocation>>//

The agent comes by and takes it away.

[[Okay|Workshop]]

passages.name: break
passages.text: You lean back against the engine and close your eyes and let it drown out the <<replace "screams">>noise.\n\nAnd [[stare|interval][$destination = "Your chambers"]] at the sky.<<endreplace>>

passages.name: dry
passages.text:
<<print either("Urchins draw lines in the dust, doing their rituals of luck against starvation and luck against police brutality","Ligabirds perch on ship ribs","River glass glints","Urchins sleep in the shade of an upturned hull","A scavenger is poking the dust with a stick, scraping for drowned trinkets","Dead vines wave in the wind like sunbleached hair","Sewer holes ooze. Nightmare runoff creeps across the ground","A spidercat mends its rat-heavy web","Angel corpse rots in the sun","Dust striders dance down the canal like sticks blown in the wind","A rat kid is running around laughing as she wears a human skull fragment on her face like an opera mask","Rat kids are digging up lung fish for their meal, lithe little claws cracking mud cocoons to pull out the soft fleshy coil inside")>>.

[[Watch|dry]]

[[Look away|City]]

passages.name: Five seconds
passages.text: The Empress rakes her hand across Sedina's abdomen. Skin and cloth comes away in her claws, so bloody you can't tell them apart.\n\n[[Six seconds]]<<loopsound "creep.mp3">>

passages.name: "Nothing has changed."
passages.text: "I'm sorry. But...I'm glad you see clearly, what kind of place this is."\n\n[[Silence|dress]]

passages.name: Shh
passages.text: Draw a sigil of burial.\n\n[[Done|Balconies]]

passages.name: worktable
passages.text:
Stained schematics depict a metal tube with a glass lens. You tried to build one before but didn't have the materials. The glass is fine and pure here.

<<if $telescope_make gte 4>>The telescope is complete. This will look good on the balcony.<<else>><<if $energy is 1>>[[Work on telescope|worktable][$telescope_make += 1,$energy -= 1]]<<else>>Too tired to work.<<endif>><<endif>>

[[Get up|Workshop]]

passages.name: apart
passages.text: You hear a [[mewling sound]].<<set $together = false>>

passages.name: ending
passages.text: A dead person is curled up inside your hamper.\n\n[["I am sorry, dead person, but you must leave"|leave]]

links.text: "I am sorry, dead person, but you must leave"

passages.name: Let the wind take it
passages.text: You let it flutter away. Loving yourself means destroying the physical reminders of the past.\n\n[[No more]]

passages.name: ectoplasm
passages.text: Mercury of the soul. Each sample has its own wildness, its own tendency to warping.\n\n[[Just looking makes you dizzy|Visitors]]

passages.name: nice nails
passages.text:
The ritual is soothing.

She painted your nails a different color.

[[Green|you hate]].

passages.name: endless
passages.text:
<<replace "You pour endless things into the dark left by your dreamlessness.">>You pour endless things into the dark left by your dreamlessness.

<<replace "None of them can replace the dreams. It's like trying to create air just by thinking about it. Something so invisible and ethereal as to resemble thought itself.">>None of them can replace the dreams. It's like trying to create air with your imagination. Something so invisible and ethereal as to resemble thought itself.

But dreams are [[physical|interval]] as blood and bone.<<set $destination = "Your chambers">><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3" >><<loopsound "scene.mp3">>

passages.name: empress
passages.text: Another agent enters the room, followed by the Empress like a monstrous shadow.\n\n[[Sedina]] is standing very still.

passages.name: name
passages.text:
But in the morning when they were gone to work, you found the other book, and you held a different name inside.

<<if $month is 1>><<set $name = "Sparna">><<endif>><<if $month is 2>><<set $name = "Danika">><<endif>><<if $month is 3>><<set $name = "Casence">><<endif>><<if $month is 4>><<set $name = "Ciara">><<endif>><<if $month is 5>><<set $name = "Mia">><<endif>><<if $month is 6>><<set $name = "Purify">><<endif>><<if $month is 7>><<set $name = "Cade">><<endif>><<if $month is 8>><<set $name = "Lon">><<endif>><<if $month is 9>><<set $name = "Caromine">><<endif>><<if $month is 10>><<set $name = "Haze">><<endif>><<if $month is 11>><<set $name = "Grale">><<endif>><<if $month is 12>><<set $name = "Langloss">><<endif>><<$name>> <<if $eye is "Brown">>Jan<<endif>><<if $eye is "Gray">>Um<<endif>><<if $eye is "Blue">>Pero<<endif>><<if $eye is "Black">>Ar<<endif>><<if $eye is "Green">>Ophi<<endif>><<if $eye is "Hazel">>Azi<<endif>><<if $eye is "Violet">>Meli<<endif>><<if $eye is "Amber">>Ci<<endif>><<if $eye is "Heterochromic">>Hexa<<endif>><<if $eye is "Nothing here describes my eyes">>Io<<endif>><<if $element is "Machine">>vir<<endif>><<if $element is "Fur">>das<<endif>><<if $element is "Mud">>dor<<endif>><<if $element is "Tears">>gloss<<endif>><<if $element is "Petal">>dot<<endif>><<if $element is "Feather">>det<<endif>>.

[[And ten years disappeared|intro]]

passages.name: chasm people
passages.text: After a while you both go [[silent]].

passages.name: "Let's go."
passages.text: <<timedgoto "chased" 1.5s>>

passages.name: radiant
passages.text:
She sinks into the corner. Her dark hair covers her face and she tries to blow it away, finally <<cyclinglink $surrendering "surrendering with" "becoming" "leaking" "enshrining">> hysterical laughter.

You stare at the inside of your <<cyclinglink $mind "mind" "brain" "soul" "weird psychic meat shit">> for awhile. When you look back she's under <<cyclinglink $worktable "your" "the" "how does property work">> worktable sleeping or maybe staring at her own mind. You shake her gently. She curls up, eyes closed, squeezing the leg of the table like a stuffed animal.

But you, you feel [[energized]].

passages.name: sleepless
passages.text: You don't [[sleep]].<<set $working = true>>

passages.name: css light
jellyfire
passages.text: People are walking toward a clearing in the garden, a grass expanse covered in [[dark circles]].

passages.name: "I'm kind of over eating. Kind of over having a corporeal body.
passages.text: "Hahah. Seriously. Really overrated. Breathing sucks too."\n\n[[Time passes in a very nice way|chasm people]]

links.text: Time passes in a very nice way

passages.name: leave
passages.text:
Why must I leave?

[["Because you are dead."|alive]]

[["Because I am alive."|alive]]

passages.name: Shame
passages.text: Draw a sigil of shame.\n\n[[Done|bad]]

passages.name: bad
passages.text: Certain days came to represent those bad times. They visit you, and [[that day]] holds all the days in its hands, as the tip of a spear carries the weight of the entire spear.

passages.name: design_wearable
passages.text:
a <<cyclinglink $type_1 "diadem" "gauntlet" "mask">>

made of

<<cyclinglink $material_1 "heretic bone" "dronesteel" "lake crystal">>

[[Yes|material_result]]

passages.name: And fall asleep on the grass
passages.text: <<timedgoto "Garden" 4s>>

passages.name: bonfire
passages.text: Dehydrated femme carcasses are being thrown in the fire pits. Everyone is drinking and having a good time.\n\n[[And you|draw spore]]

passages.name: weapon_desc
passages.text:
<<if $weapon_material_1 is "the bones of a rival tyrant">>You hear the empress removed the bones without breaking the skin. One of her better party tricks.<<endif>><<if $weapon_material_1 is "dream-dripped steel">>Forged in the cool fires of dream. Not red hot, not white hot, but prism hot, the fresh <<if $weapon_type is "whip">>tip of the whip<<endif>><<if $weapon_type is "dagger">>blade<<endif>><<if $weapon_type is "bow">>limbs of the bow<<endif>> plunged into a vat of distilled wakefulness, hissing with oneiric heat.<<endif>><<if $weapon_material_1 is "barrow queen chitin">>You've seen the skulldiers swarming into the wasteland hills like ants, fighting their eternal war against the barrow queens.

Apparently the queens defend themselves by triggering a shockwave of orgasms, leaving writhing bodies helpless amid the coffin shards. No one knows what happens afterwards, but it could hardly be anything so boring as death.<<endif>>

[[Yes|blessing_weapon]]

passages.name: pull you
passages.text:
You reach the garden and the hands become feet, fanning out, kicking at bushes, stomping out soft pink sporeflesh.

Everything that happens today is this question:

Are you [[part of the world, one with others, a person|together]], or [[are you alone and apart?|apart]]

links.text: part of the world, one with others, a person

passages.name: telescope
passages.text: Look at [[jungle]] or [[waste]]\n\n[[Set telescope aside|Balconies]]

passages.name: Do your meditations
passages.text: Take a deep breath.\n\n[[I am holding my breath]]<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">>

passages.name: burst
passages.text:
You stare into the sky, into the <<replace "blinding sun.">>blinding sun.

Is it <<replace "raining?">>raining?

A drop on your <<replace "face.">>face.

Another <<replace "drop.">>drop.

[[Another]].<<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.text: <<if $day is $final_day>><<fadeoutsound "drugs.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "scene.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "make.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "darkmaking.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "letter.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "friend.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "creep.mp3">><<else>><<fadeoutsound "scene.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "make.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "letter.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "creep.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "friend.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "drugs.mp3">><<fadeoutsound "intro.mp3">><<fadeinsound "wandering.mp3">><<endif>>

passages.text: <<timedgoto "end" 6s>>

passages.name: exhale
passages.text:
<<if $dead_person is "lake">><<print either("You exhale death.","You exhale a breathe of cold air, like winter was in your throat.","You exhale her ashes.","You exhale the glass dust of her vaporized tears.")>><<else>>Exhale.<<endif>>

[[I am holding my breath]]

[[I need different breaths]]

[[Stop|Lake]]

passages.name: see
passages.text: Draw a sigil of insight.\n\n[[And fall asleep on the grass]]

links.text: And fall asleep on the grass

destination.name: And fall asleep on the grass

passages.name: connect
passages.text: As if behind those shadowy leaves the walls weren't lurking less than a minute away.\n\n[[Look back|Turn away, toward the dark trees]]

destination.name: Turn away, toward the dark trees

passages.name: escape
passages.text: <<timedgoto "hotel" 9s>><<stopallsound>>

passages.name: fail
passages.text: Ideate: <<cyclinglink $ideate "Letting go" "Falling into the sky" "Into the jungle" "Into the sea" "Riding into the storm" "Shredded by gravel" "Crashing" "Breaking apart" "Screaming">><<timedgoto "break the loop" 16s>>

passages.name: home

links.text: Fold it up and place it in the bottom of your chest

destination.name: Fold it up and place it in the bottom of your chest

passages.name: yes
passages.text:
"The last time I saw you, you were--"

<<$horrible>>

"...yes."

[["I hoped to see you again. Now that things are different."|hope]]

links.text: "I hoped to see you again. Now that things are different."

passages.name: StorySettings
passages.text:
jquery:off
hash:off
bookmark:on
modernizr:off
undo:on
obfuscate:off
exitprompt:on
blankcss:off

passages.name: Let it be
passages.text: The spore crawls into a strangler fig hollow, climbing weakly up the choked spiral.\n\n[[The mob rushes to the courtyard]]

links.text: The mob rushes to the courtyard

destination.name: The mob rushes to the courtyard

passages.name: dream distillery
passages.text:
Pale, shriveled humans sleep forever on the floor. Pipes run from their [[heads]] into iron barrels.

<<if $tasted is false>>This batch has a <<print either("fine","rich","pale","bright","vivid")>> <<print either("mauve","crimson","black","white","chartreuse")>> color. You take a <<replace "sip.">>sip.<<set $tasted = true>>

A bouquet of <<print either("fight or flight", "co-morbidity","genetic predisposition","claustrophobia","drowning","agorophobia","stormclouds","malignant narcissism","trichotillomania")>>, <<print either("a crisp","a subtle","a bold","an intense","a powerful","a refined","a delicate")>> flavor of <<print either("idealism","hope","ecstatic clarity","charity","lust","compassion","defiance","adoration","cuteness","zealotry","intimacy","grace")>>, and an aftertaste of <<print either("humiliation","broken promises","regret","miscarriage","surveillance","anhedonia","betrayal","injustice","harm","trauma","erasure","ostracism","exile","suspicion","suspicion","amnesia","penitence")>>.<<endreplace>><<else>>[[Workers]] are <<print either("watering the humans","checking pipes for leaks","cleaning up dream spills","bottling fermented dreams")>>.<<endif>>

[[Leave|City]]

passages.name: material_result
passages.text:
<<if $material_1 is "heretic bone">>You swirl the marrow. These are fairly pristine for heretic bones. No fire damage, only slight splintering from pressure. Rack? The placing of many heavy stones over a long period of time? Torn apart by horses?

It's hilarious how many ways there are to destroy someone.<<endif>><<if $material_1 is "lake crystal">>Translucent crystals from the lake. They've absorbed a thousand of the empress' larval cycles. Marinated in her sacred waters.<<endif>><<if $material_1 is "dronesteel">>You melt carefully, avoiding the reservoirs of toxic fluid, the dormant lightning, the cylinders that corrupt air itself.<<endif>>

[[And then...|glyphs]]

passages.name: bio-matter
passages.text:
<<if $body_material is "blood">>You find a vein and slide the needle in.

Drops of blood ooze from your skin, climbing your hand like a glistening red glove.<<endif>><<if $body_material is "bone">>You take a chisel and hollow needle and pound it into the bone. You pour drops of melter into the needle

A tendril of bone rises through the hole. You wrap it around your finger and pull.<<endif>><<if $body_material is "skin">>You pour the melter on your leg. The skin liquefies and wraps around your arm like a black snake.<<endif>>

[[Yes|another vial]]

passages.name: black boxes
passages.text: The boxes are full of white liquid. They never overflow, no matter how much liquid drains from the maidens.\n\n[[Look away|temple]]

passages.name: Sedina
passages.text: You try to catch her gaze. She meets your eyes for a moment before nodding and looking away.\n\nYou start [[breathing]] again.

passages.name: Untitled Passage 2
passages.text: -new text at temple during days 14-17\n-new activity at lake\n-you can see sigils at end

passages.name: please
passages.text: Please remember: nothing you can do is wrong.<<timedgoto "premonth" 4.5s>><<fadeinsound "intro.mp3">>

passages.name: sleep_process
passages.text:
<<set $weather = random(1,7)>><<set $tasted = false>>
<<if $day neq 1>><<set $dead_person = either("garden","workshop","city","lake","balcony","temple")>><<endif>>
<<if $hormone_day is 7>><<set $hormone_need = true>><<set $hormone_day = 0>><<endif>>
<<set $day += 1>><<set $hormone_day += 1>><<set $energy = 1>>

passages.name: do you
passages.text:
"Do you want your nails done?"

[[YES|nails]]

passages.name: Crush them
passages.text: You step close. They billow in response, puffing larger than you would have thought.\n\nLittle princess teeth glitter and drip[[--|tears]]

passages.name: prayer labyrinth
passages.text:
A maze without walls.

This is the meaning of faith.

[[Yes|temple]]

passages.name: new
passages.text: Draw a sigil of new beginnings on your skin.\n\n[[Done|interval][$destination = "sleep"]]

passages.name: falling
passages.text: She is talking to someone.\n\nYou [[disappear|Throneroom]].

passages.name: temple
passages.text:
A [[censer]] burns, filling the temple with smoke. A row of [[jars]] sits behind curtains. <<if $dead_person is "temple" and $day neq 1>>A dead person is riding on the neck of a statue. They watch you.<<endif>>

<<if $day gte 14 and $day lte 17>><<if $day is 14>>The dire maidens are walking the [[prayer labyrinth]].<<endif>><<if $day is 15>>The dire maidens are kissing the feet of the [[statues]] that traveled here from Damasay, and bathing their wounds of acid rain.<<endif>><<if $day is 16>>The dire maidens are mortifying themselves with [[nerve coils]].<<endif>><<if $day is 17>>The dire maidens are draining their confessions into [[black boxes]].<<endif>><<else>>The [[gods]] are silent.<<endif>>

[[Leave|City]]

passages.name: The mob is going inside the palace
passages.text: You hear movement in an [[alcove|huddling]].

passages.name: Turn away, toward the dark trees
passages.text: The noise recedes. While your gaze is turned, the garden seems like a lost splinter of forest that must somehow [[connect]] to all other forests.\n\nThe old year is [[ending|new]].

passages.name: nails
passages.text:
She paints

<<replace "the first nail">>the first nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the second nail">>the second nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the third nail">>the third nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the fourth nail">>the fourth nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the fifth nail">>the fifth nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the sixth nail">>the sixth nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the seventh nail">>the seventh nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the eighth nail">>the eighth nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the ninth nail">>the ninth nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>
<<replace "the tenth nail">>the tenth nail<<set $nail += 1>><<if $nail is 10>><<timedgoto "nice nails" 2s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: free
passages.text: Young jellyfire bursts free, smoking the tips of her hair. After so little fermentation they barely float, wafting across the grass like low [[devouring]] clouds.

passages.name: credits
passages.text:
With Those We Love Alive

by [[Porpentine|http://slimedaughter.com]] Scored by [[Brenda Neotenomie|https://soundcloud.com/neotenomie]] Testing and Feedback by [[Lilith|http://cicadamarionette.com]] [[Ben Esposito|http://torahhorse.com]] [[Brenda Neotenomie|https://soundcloud.com/neotenomie]] princess spores inspired by Goddesses17 [[Sigils|http://porpentine.tumblr.com/tagged/glory-2-with-those-we-love-alive]]

passages.name: nerve coils
passages.text: Intestines soaked in a nightmare-lye blend, then twisted into whips. Each lash carries a night of terror.\n\n[[Flinch|temple]]

passages.name: "Yes."
passages.text:
She looks into your eyes like she's trying to find something.

"I hope so."

[[Silence|dress]]

passages.name: heads
passages.text: A living breathing terroir of flesh.\n\n[[Detach yourself|dream distillery]]

passages.name: mewling sound
passages.text: A princess spore is crawling through the leaves. It stares in your direction, lips trembling, struggling to open its kittenblind eyes.\n\n<<if $together is false>>[[Let it be]]<<else>>[[Crush it]]<<endif>>

passages.name: fantasies
passages.text: She is standing in the center of the room, flanked by pillars of stone and light. An [[agent]] is listening to her.\n\n"I brought a gift for the [[Empress|empress]], a token of loyalty from my coven."

passages.name: Crush it
passages.text: The spore is soft and crumbling in your hands. Its cries fade like the whine of a pierced balloon.\n\n[[The mob rushes to the courtyard]]

links.text: The mob rushes to the courtyard

destination.name: The mob rushes to the courtyard

passages.name: You dare not refuse
passages.text: Their juice stains your fingers. It lingers on your mouth, sweet turning to bitter like sun to evening.\n\n[[Lick your lips|jellyfire]]

passages.name: feeling
passages.text:
The garden is beautiful tonight but somehow this is all you can think of.

She sees it in your <<replace "face.">>face.

"<<$name>>...."

<<cyclinglink $respond "I'm okay." "I can't stop thinking about it." "You shouldn't have to deal with my shit. Let's just have a good time.">>

[[Answer|vial]]<<endreplace>><<fadeinsound "friend.mp3">>

passages.name: last
passages.text:
"The last time I saw you, you were--"

<<cyclinglink $horrible "Miserable?" "A wreck?" "A horrible creature of gender?">>

"...[[yes]]."

passages.name: Palace
passages.text:
The palace courtyard.<<if $day is 21>> It [[rained]] while you were asleep.<<endif>><<if $dead_person is "palace">> A dead person is whispering against the wall.<<endif>>

A [[balcony|Balconies]] looks upon the outside world. <<if $day is 0>>The throne room is closed for the Empress's inaugural blood bath.<<else>>The [[throne room|Throneroom]] lies deeper inside the palace.<<endif>>

[[Your chambers]] are on the second floor.

The [[garden|Garden]] sprawls over there. Your [[workshop|Workshop]] is in a cabin down a shady path.

<<if $day is $final_day>>The city entrance is barricaded.<<else>>The [[city|City]] is through a vast archway hanging with vines.<<endif>><<display "wanderfade">>

passages.name: spill
passages.text: <<replace "A stick of mascara.">><<replace "An estroglyph.">><<replace "A piece of salt candy.">>[[Something that doesn't exist]]<<endreplace>><<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: css dark
k
passages.text:
She looks tired.

[["I'll see you tomorrow."|going]]

[["I need to sleep but I'll miss you."|going]]

[["Good night, Sedina."|going]]

links.text: "I need to sleep but I'll miss you."

passages.name: dark circles
passages.text:
Jellyfire is released from the metal tubes in the earth where it fermented for the last year. It ripples into the sky in gorgeous sheets of color.

[[Lie on your back and stare|floats]]

[[Turn away, toward the dark trees]]

links.text: Lie on your back and stare
Turn away, toward the dark trees

destination.name: Turn away, toward the dark trees

passages.name: Get on your knees and lick her stain
passages.text: You get on your knees, palms flat on the cool stone, and close your eyes. Your tongue flicks out to taste a drop of her putrid nectar.\n\n[[Deep sigh]]

passages.name: priestess
passages.text: Goddesses of anomaly and aberration, their domain is everything not. Their earthly manifestations are permanently burning origami angels.\n\n[[Fascinating|Visitors]]

passages.name: rained
passages.text: Hot humid rain flooding downhill into the city.\n\n[[Your skin feels sticky|Palace]]

passages.name: thing
passages.text:
You limp down the hall with the thing wrapped under a cloth. An agent rushes past. Through a window you see the walls bristling with skulldiers.

The [[sovereign body]] has been threatened.

passages.name: scaffolding
passages.text:
Oily stains unreal the wood. Looks like nightmare damage.

A sign says: //Repairs done in a week or so. Come back later to try our free samples!//

[[Leave|City]]

passages.name: berry
passages.text: "The empress has a gift for you."\n\nThe agent holds [[something]] in her hand.

passages.name: swim
passages.text:
You and her jump in the lake and start swimming for the distant shore.

The water sucks at you, thick and silty and freezing. Your horizon: whirling wet bark, her surging shoulders, dead branches like crocodiles.

Your throat is filling with dirt-tasting water. She sees you [[struggling]] and reaches for your hand.

passages.name: StoryAuthor
passages.text: Porpentine

passages.name: drugs
passages.text: A long time ago she caught you bashing your head on the wall, the red stain getting bigger and bigger.\n\nShe held you until the [[feeling]] passed.<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">>

passages.name: sweetness
passages.text: <<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "creep.mp3">>The empress and her agents pass by your window. Her abdomen is [[swollen]], trailing on the ground.

passages.name: Eight seconds
passages.text:
She smashes Sedina into the wall. All the air comes out of her, and some blood.

Sedina slides to the floor. The doors to the throne room burst open and agents fill the room.

[[Throw up]]

passages.name: bath
passages.text:
The empress is naked in her bath of [[worms]].

She <<replace "is thinking.">>thinks, make me a new [[hand|empress_hand]].

Her thoughts linger like the fog of a kiss on your brain.<<endreplace>><<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "creep.mp3">>

passages.name: interstice
passages.text: <<timedgoto "please" 1.5s>>

passages.name: statues
passages.text:
The metastasis of a hard heart.

Penance through erosion.

[[Okay|temple]]

passages.name: weapon_message
passages.text: //The empress has need of a weapon, something to hang in the throne room.//\n\n[[Okay|Your chambers]]<<set $working to true>>

passages.name: note writer
passages.text: You sit in your room for an hour then find a piece of paper and a [[pen|note]].<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3" >><<loopsound "scene.mp3">>

passages.name: Return to your room
passages.text: <<cyclinglink $sweat "Her humidity" "Your sweat">> clings to you. You imagine ichor extruding from your skin for every step you take up the stairs, like those magic tricks where someone pulls a scarf from nowhere.\n\n[[Ugh|Your chambers]]

passages.name: red lake
passages.text:
Dead brown leaves cover inky black lake.

<<replace "Something is rising from the lake.">>The Empress rises from the water, dragging her train of leaves and ichor. Her larval skin floats across the lake like the carcass of a pale leviathan.

Her aides pick wet plant matter from her skull.

[[Wait]]<<endreplace>>

passages.name: replace
down
passages.text: Always down. Always silent. Nothing leaves the fortress of your mouth.\n\nDo they die on the teeth? Do they suffocate in the throat? Or maybe no words ever existed, it's just deluded air rising and [[falling]].

passages.name: Start
passages.text: [[<3|thislife]]

passages.name: which day
passages.text: Hard to remember, isn't it? The feelings were hot and cold, fluxing so fast and intense it seemed like you would crack and split, and they color that [[day]] like water damage on a painting.

passages.name: empress_hand
passages.text:
Under the worms you see the bonerot in her left hand. Some congenital malady of the skull empresses? A hex from some nemesis?

It doesn't matter.

You feel [[strange|intimacy]].

passages.name: hand_material_result
passages.text:
<<if $hand_material is "sangwood claws">>Thick red sap stains your gloves. The tree is watered with blood for 20 years before it is felled.<<endif>><<if $hand_material is "diamond with platinum joints">>Each diamond comes from a different city-state. Extinct city-states. You melt them together like sculpting water.<<endif>><<if $hand_material is "tortured ectoplasm">>You can feel the pain in the ectoplasm smeared all over your fingers. For an unknown period of time, you can't tell your thoughts from the thoughts of this ectoplasm.

You set the ecto and wipe the trauma from your fingers.<<endif>>

[[Okay|hand_flourish]]

passages.name: spores
passages.text: The drunken hands of the mob [[pull you]] along.

passages.name: "Okay get me fifty rolls."
passages.text: "Ha. I've never seen anyone explode before so that could be pretty fun."\n\n[[Time passes in a very nice way|chasm people]]

links.text: Time passes in a very nice way

passages.name: bench
passages.text: Lying on a garden bench. Her vials of ectoplasm are gone, replaced by a bag of hard precious things. She shows you one of the [[coins]].<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3" >><<fadeinsound "friend.mp3">>

passages.name: princess spores
passages.text: The sky is full of [[pink]] like a volcanic burst of petals.<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "spores.mp3">>

passages.name: css empress
cycling
silent
passages.text:
"It still hurts, doesn't it."

"<<cyclinglink $hurts "These things don't just go away." "Yes." "No, I didn't mind being psychically mutilated as a child at all, what are you talking about.">>"

[[Answer|close]]

passages.name: her
passages.text: Her face <<replace "was a scar palette">>is healed<<set $face += 1>><<if $face gte 2>><<timedgoto "post_face" 3.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>, her hair <<replace "was a tar ballet">>is combed night<<set $face += 1>><<if $face gte 2>><<timedgoto "post_face" 3.5s>><<endif>><<endreplace>>.<<fadeoutsound "scene.mp3">><<fadeinsound "friend.mp3">>

passages.name: devouring
passages.text:
You hear the sounds of the [[garden dying]], and the pursuers dying. Both are very different, but become the same after awhile.

Sedina grabs your hand and pulls you toward the darkest part of the garden, where the foliage is high and tangled and the ground is swampy.

[[Run or die]]

passages.name: coins
passages.text:
"I think this is worth like, fifty of those fried rolls. Remember the rolls? The ones you ate every day for awhile? You loved that shit."

[["Okay get me fifty rolls."]]

[["I'm kind of over eating. Kind of over having a corporeal body.]]

links.text: "I'm kind of over eating. Kind of over having a corporeal body.

destination.name: "I'm kind of over eating. Kind of over having a corporeal body.

passages.name: chased
passages.text: <<replace "Chased through the garden">>Chased through the garden, <<if $body_material is "blood">>blood itching and burning<<endif>><<if $body_material is "bone">>bones tearing you inside<<endif>><<if $body_material is "skin">>skin burning like acid<<endif>>.\n\nThrough the place where [[fire|burning]] sleeps underground.<<endreplace>><<stopsound>><<loopsound "escape.mp3">>

passages.name: wearable_message
passages.text: //The empress needs something nice for the ceremony. Something to adorn her.//\n\n[[Okay|Your chambers]]<<set $working to true>>

passages.name: hand_flourish
passages.text: And <<cyclinglink $hand_flourish "set with a giant ruby" "veined with bright copper strands of hair" "fitted with obsidian nails">>\n\n[[Yes|hand_flourish_result]]

passages.name: drank
passages.text: That night you fell into a horrible fever. You sweated until it felt like strings threaded with broken glass were being pulled through your pores. You hallucinated. You fried. You could see nothing but the inside of your own [[skull]].

passages.name: music
Let it go
passages.text: The spore reaches the top of the balcony. It starts crying.\n\n[[The mob is going inside the palace]]

links.text: The mob is going inside the palace

destination.name: The mob is going inside the palace

passages.name: wrapped
passages.text:
wrapped in

<<cyclinglink $wrapped "white cloth" "snakeskin" "human skin leather" "funeral shroud">>

[[Yes|wearable_result]]

passages.name: floats
passages.text: The sky is full of jellyfire like disemboweled rainbows.\n\nThe old year is [[ending|new]].

passages.name: final
passages.text:
You choose

<<cyclinglink $body_material "blood" "bone" "skin">>

[[Yes|bio-matter]]

passages.name: friend
passages.text:
<<if $looked is false>><<set $looked = true>>You look at her and she looks at you. Then she looks away.<<else>>She is staring straight ahead. She will not meet your gaze.

It's been a long time.<<endif>>

[[Stop staring|Visitors]]

passages.name: Four seconds
passages.text: Sedina runs up to the Empress, bare feet pattering on the marble floor.\n\n[[Five seconds]]

passages.name: throne
passages.text: Glossy white wood swarming with termites, stained with empress effluvia. Deep gouges in the arms.\n\n[[Turn away|Throneroom]]

passages.name: eyes
passages.text:
What color are your eyes?

<<cyclinglink $eye "Brown" "Gray" "Blue" "Black" "Green" "Hazel" "Violet" "Amber" "Heterochromic" "Nothing here describes my eyes">>

[[Yes|dead name]]

passages.name: draw spore
passages.text: Draw the sigil of what you feel.\n\n[[And go to sleep|interval][$destination = "sleep"]]

passages.name: that day
passages.text:
You were with her that day, <<cyclinglink $holding "holding her hand" "as she held your hand">>, tighter and tighter as the yelling got louder.

[[It was a cold day|which day]]

[[It was a hot day|which day]]

passages.name: Walk past with eyes straight ahead
passages.text: Sedina is bruised, eyes swollen, broken finger, fingernails bleeding, wrists hung in nullhex manacles, [[spells]] in chastity.\n\n[["Let's go."]]

passages.name: portrait
passages.text:
<<if $painting is false>>Her majestic <<cyclinglink $empress_1 "atlas beetle" "ram" "stag">> horns

Her mantle of <<cyclinglink $empress_2 "moth fur" "anemone tendrils" "fleshrags">>

Her eyes <<cyclinglink $empress_3 "burning with cold fire" "drooling with soulsludge" "crawling with snakes">>.

[[Just so|portrait][$painting = true]]<<else>>
Her majestic <<$empress_1>> horns, her mantle of <<$empress_2>>, her eyes <<$empress_3>>.

[[Look away|Throneroom]]<<endif>>

passages.name: garden dying
passages.text: A twinge of pain as you flash back to that drugged night in the garden. But you are no longer tied to these plants. They betrayed you by serving the forces of evil.\n\n[[Blink|devouring]]

passages.name: hotel
passages.text:
A hotel as far as distance.

Rain pours down cracked blue clay, turning the road to mud and flooding the yard with demipond puddles.

[[Breathe]]

passages.name: sovereign body
passages.text: To attack the sovereign body and fail is the same as wounding the sovereign body, because the body is not a body of flesh and blood, it is a body of power.\n\nPower is wounded by anything that refuses to be [[destroyed]] by it.

passages.name: Deep sigh
passages.text: You lick her from the ground until the ground is clean. Your lips and teeth are purple with empress juice. Your breath smells like you've been eating the refuse of an orchard or a toilet.\n\n[[Get up|Palace]]

passages.name: crimson
passages.text:
Guts splash the lake and slap the dirt as princesses flit through the air, the teeth of their limbs slung and rippling.

Moth riders crash, shrapnel shrieks, skulldiers leap through the trees, arrows fly, spears stab, princesses scream, pink goop melts human flesh.

She yells [[something|swim]] in your ear.

passages.name: talents
passages.text:
An artificer.

You make things.

You were noticed, perhaps, from your showings, and sometimes victories, in the festivals.

[[And now you are going somewhere]]

links.text: And now you are going somewhere

destination.name: And now you are going somewhere

passages.name: impulse
passages.text: The impulse to say something darts up your throat like fish up a waterfall<<replace "--">>--and falls [[down]] again.<<endreplace>>

passages.name: Let them be
passages.text: They shrink in terror, trying to press themselves through stone. You back away until you can no longer see them in the shadows.\n\n[[You smell fire|bonfire]]

passages.name: stairs
passages.text: A princess spore is wriggling painfully up the steps, shuddering after each movement.\n\n<<if $together is false>>[[Let it go]]<<else>>[[Stomp it]]<<endif>>

passages.name: Throneroom
passages.text:
<<if $weapon_type neq "">>The [[<<$weapon_type>>|weapon]] of the Skull Empress hangs above the vacant [[throne]], along with her [[portrait]] on the west wall.

Her hounds <<print either("are gnawing on heretic bones", "are chained to the throne. They strain at the sight of you", "are napping", "growl low and rare", "are restless, narrow black tails whipping back and forth")>>. <<else>>The [[throne]] is vacant. The Empress's [[portrait]] covers the west wall.

The Empress' hounds <<print either("are gnawing on heretic bones", "are chained to the throne. They strain at the sight of you", "are napping", "growl low and rare", "are restless, narrow black tails whipping back and forth")>>. <<endif>> 

[[Leave|Palace]]<<display "wanderfade">>

passages.name: One second
passages.text: She places the knife inside the nearest agent, then pulls it out. Blood sprays across the floor, glittering in the sunlight.\n\n[[Two seconds]]

passages.name: waste
passages.text: <<if $weather is 1>>Warm wind carries ash and ember and the spray of sulphur geysers.<<endif>><<if $weather is 2>>Ash storms howl as they carry skin-stripping gravel across the waste.<<endif>><<if $weather is 3>>A shardstorm glitters across the waste.<<endif>><<if $weather is 4>>Anomalies ripple in the waste, reality caught fire.<<endif>><<if $weather is 5>>A barrow queen is stalking through the hills.<<endif>><<if $weather is 6>>Obelisks jut from black soil. The faint throb of purple veins under obsidian skin.<<endif>><<if $weather is 7>>Skulldiers are patrolling, spears and armor glinting when the sun pierces the ashen veil of the sky.<<endif>>\n\n[[Unlook|telescope]]

passages.name: are you
passages.text:
Are you a chasm person?

[[Yes|chasm]]

[[No|chasm]]

[[I don't know|chasm]]

passages.name: melter
passages.text: The power to sculpt metal and stone with your fingers.\n\n[[Put it back|Workshop]]

passages.name: skull
passages.text: When you woke up, you could no longer dream. In one night, it felt like you had dreamt all the dreams of a lifetime. It felt like an eternity of fire. Like what should have come slowly, gently, unfolding delicately at the whirling dance of your years, had instead been accelerated at a ruinous speed, burning <<replace "away.">>away.\n\n[[Lay awake for a long time|interval]] <<set $destination = "Your chambers">><<endreplace>>

links.text: Lay awake for a long time

passages.name: talking
passages.text:
"tthhiiisisthefirsttimeivefeltnormalsinceiwasakkkkiiid.
imsorryimamkingthisaboutme.imsorryihaventbeenthereforyou.
imsrry<<replace "foreverything.">>foreverything."

You trail away. The sky is spinning a glowing vortex of radial star lines. You fall to the ground, arms sprawled behind your head, writhing as the universe <<replace "hypnotizes you.">>hypnotizes you.

You feel the grass growing over your face. Feel yourself sinking into the earth. Soft, warm, like the roots are veins, red brown dark, fertile, rich, fecund, churning with [[life]].<<endreplace>><<endreplace>>

passages.name: nail polish
passages.text: Black.\n\n[[It glistens|her bedroom]]

passages.name: work
passages.text:
<<if $day is 3>>
They've left cases full of rare materials.

[[You've never worked with anything like this...|design_wearable]]
<<endif>>
<<if $day is 12>>
You gather materials...

[[And think of weapons|weapon_type]]
<<endif>>
<<if $day is $final_day>>
You sit at the worktable. You have no materials.

[[But you have materials|final]]
<<endif>>
<<set $working to false>><<if $day is $final_day>><<fadeoutsound "creep.mp3">><<fadeinsound "darkmaking.mp3">><<else>><<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "make.mp3">><<endif>>

links.text: You've never worked with anything like this...

passages.name: hotel room
passages.text: You enter your room. Take off your dress. The day rolls from your body like dissipating heat waves. Your wrinkles and folds exhale.\n\n[[Put away the dress|ending]]

passages.name: Break the loop
passages.text: Draw a thought loop.\n\n[[Done|break]]

passages.name: Workshop
passages.text:
<<if $dead_person is "workshop">> A dead person is under the table. <<endif>>Vials of [[melter]]. Magnifying lense. Meltless gloves. Scarred <<if $day neq 3 and $day neq 12 and $day neq $final_day>><<if $telescope_make lt 4>>[[worktable]]<<else>>worktable<<endif>><<else>>worktable<<endif>>. 

<<if $working is true>>[[Get to work|work]]<<endif>>

[[Return|Palace]]<<display "wanderfade">>

passages.name: her bedroom
passages.text: Sitting on her bed, watching her put on [[nail polish]].\n\n[[So pretty...|do you]]<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "friend.mp3">>

passages.name: weapon_type
passages.text:
a <<cyclinglink $weapon_type "dagger" "whip" "bow">>

made of

<<cyclinglink $weapon_material_1 "the bones of a rival tyrant" "dream-dripped steel" "barrow queen chitin">>

and

<<cyclinglink $weapon_material_2 "nymph-gut" "angel leather" "hatewood">>

[[Yes|weapon_desc]]

passages.name: under
passages.text: The palace is quiet and open and airy. Curtains lift languidly to reveal <<cyclinglink $reveal "garden canopy" "balconies like portals of moonlight">>.\n\nYou [[slip]] the note under her door.<<fadeoutsound "scene.mp3">>

passages.name: Three seconds
passages.text:
She grabs the agent's wrist and bends it backwards, pinning them down like the dip in a dance, driving the blade into the underside of their chin. They open their mouth and a tongue of metal flicks through, drooling red.

[[Four seconds]]

passages.name: No more
passages.text: Draw a sigil of severing.\n\n[[Done|Balconies]]

passages.name: City
passages.text:
The streets are narrow, winding, [[mazelike]]. [[Ropes]] span between buildings like enormous spiderwebs blanketing the city. <<if $dead_person is "city">>A dead person is watching you from a window.<<endif>>

The [[temple]] is this way, <<if $day gte 21>>across the [[flooded]] canal.<<else>>across the [[dry]] canal.<<endif>><<if $day gte 14 and $day lte 17>> [[Black petals]] cover the temple steps.<<endif>>

<<if $day lt 7>>The dream distillery is surrounded by [[scaffolding]].<<else>>The [[dream distillery]] has a gruesome pull for you.<<endif>>

[[Return to the palace|Palace]]

passages.name: dead name
passages.text: When you came of age, your parents used this information to give you a [[name]], running their fingers along the indexes of a book, as by custom.

passages.name: Court
passages.text: [[Visitors]] from beyond the city.<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">>

passages.name: hand_finished
passages.text:
A hand of <<$hand_material>>, <<$hand_flourish>>.

The agent takes it away.

[[Okay|Workshop]]

passages.name: Lake
passages.text:
Dead brown leaves cover inky black lake.<<if $dead_person is "lake" and $day neq 1>> A dead person is staring from below the water.<<endif>>

[[Do your meditations]]

[[Return|Garden]]

passages.name: agent
passages.text: Dark, utile clothing. Blue eyes. Asymmetric brown hair. Broken nose.\n\n[[Glance back|fantasies]]

passages.name: shame
passages.text: When you left, you were both so angry. So ugly with <<replace "bitterness.">>bitterness.\n\nIt [[drowns]].<<endreplace>><<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "scene.mp3">>

passages.name: Chest
passages.text: Estroglyphs. Spiroglyphs. Identical to the ones on your body.<<if $letter_1 is true>> The letter you will never open again.<<endif>>\n\n[[Precious|Your chambers]]

passages.name: intro
passages.text: The agent of the Skull Empress came to your apartment and spoke to you:\n\n"The Empress's larval stage is almost complete. We invite you to reside in the palace and share your [[talents]]."

passages.name: something
passages.text: Three red berries on a waxy white leaf.\n\n[[You dare not refuse]]

passages.name: slip
passages.text: Draw the sigil of influencing this outcome.\n\n[[And go back to bed|sleep]]

passages.name: chasm
passages.text: Draw the sigil of your relationship with the chasm.\n\n[[Done|interval][$destination = "Garden"]]

passages.name: close
passages.text:
She leans close. Her breath smells like sweet salt. You can see the healed scars on her face, like faded borders in a land overrun by sand.

"What they did to me on the outside, they did to you on the inside.

"We are the same. <<replace "Separated from the world.">>Separated from the world.

[[Chasm people|are you]]."<<endreplace>>

passages.name: Your chambers
passages.text:
<<if $day neq 3 and $day neq 12 and $day neq $final_day>>A [[chest|Chest]] under your bed.<<endif>>

<<if $day is 3 and $wearable_message is false>><<set $wearable_message = true>>A [[message|wearable_message]] is pinned to the door.<<elseif $day is 12 and $weapon_message is false>><<set $weapon_message = true>>A [[message|weapon_message]] is pinned to the door.
<<else>>
<<if $hormone_need is true>>You need to [[re-apply hormones|hormones]]
<<elseif $ceremony is true>>The ceremony is in the garden tonight.
<<elseif $working is true>>You have work to do.<<else>>[[Sleep|sleep]]<<endif>>

[[Exit|Palace]]<<endif>><<display "wanderfade">>

passages.name: dress
passages.text:
"That's a nice dress," she says.

Pride warms you, as if the summer sun had melted through the cold marble.

"I have to go show some asshole all the glorious myriad benefits of ectoplasm, but can we meet tomorrow?"

[["That would be nice."|nice]]

passages.name: ceremony
passages.text:
<<set $ceremony = false>><<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "scene.mp3">>The garden is strung with lights and thronged with dancing.

The empress wears her <<$type_1>>. You can't tell where her hollow eyes are <<replace "pointed.">>pointed.

An agent [[approaches|berry]].<<endreplace>>

passages.name: "I don't know."
passages.text: "I remember something you used to say. Something like, our brain won't let us know until it's over. Or else we couldn't function."\n\n[[Silence|dress]]

passages.name: different
passages.text:
"Are things different now?"

[["What happened then will never happen again."|"Yes."]]

[["Nothing has changed."]]

[["I don't know."]]

links.text: "What happened then will never happen again."

passages.name: you hate
passages.text:
You say, "I was so worried when I saw you here. I know you hate these people."

She returns the nail polish to her nightstand. It clicks against the glass. "Time passes. We get over things."

[["Yeah."|k]]

passages.name: end
passages.text: <<playsound "end.mp3">><<timedgoto "credits" 105s>>

passages.name: Garden
passages.text: Glass flowers on iron stalks. Canopy of leafbone. [[Statues]] sunk into the earth.<<if $dead_person is "garden">> A dead person is in the trees.<<endif>>\n\nThe [[lake|Lake]] is down that path. <<if $ceremony is true>>The [[ceremony]] is beginning.<<else>>Or back to the [[palace|Palace]].<<endif>><<display "wanderfade">>

passages.name: note
passages.text:
Write your note:

Sedina,
<<cyclinglink $note1 "I'm begging you not to do this." "please dont." "are you insane?">>
They will <<cyclinglink $note2 "never forgive this" "hurt you" "torture you to death">>.
Please understand...<<cyclinglink $note3 "we can be happy far away from here" "I can't live without you" "you are so much better than those parasites">>.

Signed,
<<cyclinglink $note4 "Your friend" "The one who loved you a long time ago" "*unsigned because who else could it be*">>

[[Leave the note under her door|under]]

links.text: Leave the note under her door

passages.name: flashback_1
passages.text:
When you were very young, it was popular among the rich to distill the dreams of children. This practice is no longer in vogue, but back then, every month or so, some children would be taken.

One night your mother stood over the stove and crumbled leaves into a cup of hot water. She stirred and stirred until it was dark green.

She gave you the cup. You [[drank]] it, because she was your mother.<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3" >><<loopsound "scene.mp3">>

passages.name: Run or die
passages.text:
The lake, black and rotten, is suddenly at your feet.

Sedina pushes you behind her. Your feet sink into the cold mud.

The sound of mothriders fills the air like sawblades.

[[Blink|princess]]

passages.name: css pink
hormones
passages.text:
You take an estroglyph and spiroglyph from the chest and <<replace "press them to your thigh">>press them to your thigh.

They sink through the skin and glow softly under the surface, intelligent veins of blue and white.<<set $hormone_need = false>>

[[Okay|Your chambers]]<<endreplace>>

passages.name: Seven seconds
passages.text: Sedina grabs at the Empress, fingers clutching at her skull, filling her eye sockets and nose. The Empress lifts Sedina into the air. You never understood how tall the Empress is until now, when a human is in her hands. She has Sedina like a child.\n\n[[Eight seconds]]

passages.name: struggling
passages.text: One way or another, the dream will come.\n\n[[Fight|escape]]

passages.name: css credits
wearable_result
passages.text:
A <<$type_1>> of <<$material_1>> with glyphs of
//<<$glyph_1>>
<<$glyph_2>>
<<$glyph_3>>//
wrapped in <<$wrapped>>.

The empress's agent accepts the gift. She strides away.

[[Okay|Workshop]]

passages.name: css
nice
passages.text: And then she is gone and you are [[alone|interval][$destination = "Palace"]]. Like one of the statues had spoken to you and returned to silence.

passages.name: pink
passages.text: The princess spores have burst from the empress.\n\nEveryone is running around laughing and crushing the [[spores]] as they drift to the ground.

passages.name: princess
passages.text: Something pink swarms through the underbrush.\n\n[[Surges|burst]] upwards.

passages.name: pain
passages.text:
What is there to say? If you know, you know. If you don't, nothing can show you.

Draw a sigil of pain.

[[Okay|thing]]<<fadeoutsound "darkmaking.mp3">>

passages.name: staircase
passages.text: You watch her from the staircase. It feels good to see her at peace. You know she feels the same way about you.\n\n[[Breathe|hotel room]]

passages.name: flooded
passages.text:
<<print either("Glowing tendrils undulate in the murky depths","Moons roll across the water like phosphorescent marbles","Urchin fishes for keys","An aquanomaly whorls the water ethereal","Someone paddles a lone hidestretch down the canal","They're dumping shriveled corpses from the dream distillery into the water. Thin brittle floating bags of skin","Rat kids hang out in drainage mouths","Debris from the sea: armada slivers, rotten seaweed, riftwood","Clusters of rubbery orange eggs float by","Dream distillery pollution stains the water oneiridiscent","A fish swims by, radiantly diseased with dream tumors","A rat kid pisses in the water","Rat kids sail down the canal on a raft, dragging a cube crab trap behind them","Canal orbs bonk against the wall","A canal serpent leaps up, snatching a ligabird from the air","Crab fires shine across the river where rat kids are having a feast")>>.

[[Watch|flooded]]

[[Look away|City]]

passages.name: swollen
passages.text: You can smell her from here. She smells like dead candy.\n\n[[She passes from sight]]

passages.name: hand
passages.text:
It will be made from

<<cyclinglink $hand_material "sangwood claws" "diamond with platinum joints" "tortured ectoplasm">>

[[Yes|hand_material_result]]

passages.name: vial
passages.text: She puts her hand on your shoulder.\n\n<<if $respond is "I'm okay.">>"You've never been [[okay|purple]]."<<endif>><<if $respond is "I can't stop thinking about it.">>"When the thoughts are really bad, there's something that really [[helps|purple]] me."<<endif>><<if $respond is "You shouldn't have to deal with my shit. Let's just have a good time.">>"I can't have a good time unless you're having a [[good time|purple]]."<<endif>>

passages.name: Two seconds
passages.text: She steps out of her shoes and darts toward the Empress. An agent stands in her way with a dagger.\n\n[[Three seconds]]

passages.name: blood
passages.text: Like being dragged out of a deep pit where you've lived so long in isolation you no longer had any reference point, but now that you've seen the light and tasted clean air, you'd fight like a rabid animal to stay free.\n\nYou look around and you can't [[see]] your dead friend anywhere.

passages.name: letter
passages.text: Standing on the balcony, holding a [[letter|home]] from the people who share your blood.<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3">><<fadeinsound "letter.mp3">>

passages.name: Get dressed and go to the throne room
passages.text:
Horrible fantasies steal your mind:

[[The sound of her blood being lapped up by hounds|fantasies]]

[[Her screams, worse than blood, longer lasting|fantasies]]

[[Some trophy of her placed around the palace, that you have to walk past every day for the rest of your life|fantasies]]

links.text: The sound of her blood being lapped up by hounds
Her screams, worse than blood, longer lasting
Some trophy of her placed around the palace, that you have to walk past every day for the rest of your life

passages.name: falls through your body
passages.text: You feel [[radiant]].<<stopsound "friend.mp3">><<loopsound "drugs.mp3">>

passages.name: css drugs
energized
passages.text: Running through the garden. Darkness, leaves, and the ripe surge of life crushed under your boots. You kick them off so you can suffer with the earth.\n\nYou start [[talking]] to your dead friend.

passages.name: workshop
passages.text:
She squirts the fluid inside beads of melter, like shards of emerald floating in dewdrops.

"Trust me, this is the purest way to do it."

A drop of melter lands on her skin. It disappears.

"Now you."

The drop [[falls through your body]].

passages.name: premonth
passages.text: <<timedgoto "month" 1.5s>>

passages.name: Statues
passages.text:
Some carved of stone from this century, others the husks of machines from beyond your reckoning.

It is easier for the gardeners to call the machines statues. But they were no aesthetic object.

[[Look away|Garden]]

passages.name: The mob rushes to the courtyard
passages.text: You spot something pink crawling up the [[balcony stairs|stairs]].

passages.name: timed goto
weapon
passages.text: Made of <<$weapon_material_1>> and <<$weapon_material_2>>.\n\n[[You feel little pride|Throneroom]]

passages.name: interval
passages.text:
<<timedgoto $destination 3s>>
<<fadeoutsound "creep.mp3" >>
<<fadeoutsound "letter.mp3" >>
<<fadeoutsound "make.mp3" >>
<<fadeoutsound "wandering.mp3" >>
<<fadeoutsound "scene.mp3" >>
<<fadeoutsound "spores.mp3" >>
<<fadeoutsound "drugs.mp3" >>
<<fadeoutsound "friend.mp3" >>

passages.name: life
passages.text: You think about your long life of fear. About waking up as a husk tomorrow. You clutch at the grass. It twists and tears in your hands and the dew feels like [[blood]].

passages.name: huddling
passages.text: Three spores are huddling together for warmth.\n\n<<if $together is false>>[[Let them be]]<<else>>[[Crush them]]<<endif>>

passages.name: together
passages.text: You hear a [[mewling sound]].<<set $together = true>>

passages.name: element
passages.text:
What is your element?

<<cyclinglink $element "Petal" "Tears" "Mud" "Machine" "Fur" "Feather">>

[[Yes|eyes]]

passages.name: Fold it up and place it in the bottom of your chest
passages.text: You don't want to choose. Fortunately you've been burying your problems your whole life.<<set $letter_1 to true>>\n\n[[Shh]]

passages.name: purple
passages.text: Five minutes later you're in the workshop and she's holding a glass dropper full of [[green fluid|workshop]].

passages.name: jungle
passages.text: <<if $weather is 1>>Cold rain falls in the jungle, frosting the canopy.<<endif>><<if $weather is 2>>Hot rain spatters across the jungle, steaming from the leaves.<<endif>><<if $weather is 3>>Swarms of insects rise from the jungle like black clouds.<<endif>><<if $weather is 4>>Moth riders flit over the jungle.<<endif>><<if $weather is 5>>Feral machinethings buzz through the canopy.<<endif>><<if $weather is 6>>Gold pollen fills the air like a sea of fireflies.<<endif>><<if $weather is 7>>Ancient ruins of glass and steel, infested by vines.<<endif>>\n\n[[Unlook|telescope]]

passages.name: Another
passages.text: You look at the lake and a face covered in red speckles looks back.\n\nA few seconds later your face is completely [[crimson]].

passages.name: drowns
passages.text: [[Shame]] taught the ocean everything it knows.

passages.name: intimacy
passages.text:
You imagine yourself making more and more things for the empress of increasing intimacy, until you are making her bones themselves, and then the individual components of her <<replace "soul.">>soul.

Until she is finally replaced by that which came from your hand alone.

[[Get to work|hand]]<<endreplace>>

passages.name: Throw up
passages.text: <<timedgoto "sleepless" 3s>><<stopallsound>>

passages.name: Six seconds
passages.text: The knife clatters to the tile.\n\n[[Seven seconds]]
